definition: to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
variant of 燙|烫[tang4]/variant of 趟[tang4]
to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
variant of 燙|烫[tang4]/variant of 趟[tang4]

sentences.english: Wang Pengwei sat in his empty restaurant feeling very frustrated.
sentences.chinese: 王鹏伟坐在他那空荡荡的餐馆里，感到很沮丧。

sentences.english: Empty is the White Horse Temple tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今夜的白马寺空空荡荡。

sentences.english: Sharp wind screaming through the deserted streets of Changchun University.
sentences.chinese: 锐利的风尖叫着穿过空荡荡的长春大学所有街道。

sentences.english: Today, most of them are empty" ghost towns."
sentences.chinese: 今天，大多数镇子是空荡荡的“鬼镇”。

sentences.english: My son died, now I feel empty.
sentences.chinese: 我儿子往世了，我内心空荡荡的。

sentences.english: The airport was like a ghost town, the terminal was empty and eerily silent.
sentences.chinese: 机场像座鬼城，候机大楼空空荡荡，寂静得可怕。

sentences.english: The work space is a bare and cavernous warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 工作场地是个空荡荡的大仓库。

sentences.english: He had a full seidel of beer in his right hand and his empty left sleeve was flapping.
sentences.chinese: 他的右手拿着一整杯啤酒，空荡荡的左袖管扑扇着。

sentences.english: I took my seat in a third - class carriage of a deserted train.
sentences.chinese: 我在一列空荡荡的火车的三等车厢找了个座位。

sentences.english: Return a dollar city, in the morning emptily avenue up.
sentences.chinese: 归元城，清晨空荡荡地大街上。

sentences.english: Right now these spacious halls are absolutelyempty.
sentences.chinese: 现在这些宽敞的大厅空荡荡的。

sentences.english: Disconcerted, B returned to the street and gazed at the empty sky.
sentences.chinese: B不安地回到街上，朝空荡荡的天空望去。

sentences.english: But wake up, still one of the empty house, there are endless dazed.
sentences.chinese: 但醒来，依然是这个空荡荡的房子，还有无尽的昏沉。

sentences.english: Wang Peng sat in his empty restaurant feeling very frustrated.
sentences.chinese: 王鹏坐在他那空荡荡的餐馆里，感到十分沮丧。

sentences.english: The place was empty as we left, silent as the grave.
sentences.chinese: 我们离开时，那地方空空荡荡，如坟墓一般寂静无声。

sentences.english: In the busy season the village looked deserted when all the peasants had gone to the fields.
sentences.chinese: 农忙季节，人都下地了，村子里显得空荡荡的。

definition: as empty as anything (idiom); completely bereft/to have nothing/vacuous/hollow/empty (argument, head etc)
